meanings.definition: A person who is on the same team as another.
meanings.sent1: My teammates and I work together to win games.
meanings.sent2: During the match, my teammates supported me when I was tired.
meanings.sent3: At the team party, my teammates and I danced like crazy.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, my teammates are my strongest allies.
meanings.sent5: The bond with my teammates is unbreakable.

meanings.sent1: All my teammates are skilled players.
meanings.sent2: The teammates celebrated their victory with a team dinner.
meanings.sent3: The teammates' unity was evident in their synchronized movements.
meanings.sent4: The teammates' harmony on the field was like a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The teammates' camaraderie is what makes them unbeatable.
